title: Matters of The Heart
description: Matters of The Heart takes you on an adventure into the love, work andpersonal life of Nora, a young woman who battles through dealing with anarcissistic family, her graphic design work in Sydneyâ€™s lifestyle industryand learning the consequences of getting into an illicit affair. Sheovercomes her problems through the power of strong friendships in her life.
author: Gloria Thompson
